item.title: Urkel Trees
item.description: Urkel trees: An optimized and cryptographically provable key-value store for decentralized naming Boyma Fahnbulleh (Handshake) (boymanjor) https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/1090765616590381057 Introduction Hello my name is Boy Fahnbulleh. I have been contributing to Handshake. I’ve worked on everything from building websites to writing firmware for Ledger Nano S. If you have ever written a decent amount of C, or refactored someone’s CSS, you would know how much I appreciate being able to be here at the conference instead of writing code.
